select b.id bid,b.name bname,b.author bauthor,b.publisher bpublisher,b.publish_time bpublish_time,l.time ltime,r.id return_list_id from lend_list l,book b,return_list r where l.book_id=b.id and l.id=r.lend_id and b.id in (select id from book where id like #{key}) or b.name in (select name from book where name like #{key}) or b.author in (select author from book where author like #{key}) or b.publisher in (select publisher from book where publisher like #{key}) or b.publish_time in (select publish_time from book where publish_time like #{key}) or l.time in (select time from lend_list where time like #{key})
